content:
Since you're a frequent Target shopper, you might be able to snag a deal on the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel.

Target often runs sales and promotions on various products, including skincare items. Here are a few ways to check for deals:

1. **Target App:** Download the Target app (if you haven't already) and check the "Deals" section. You can search for "Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel" to see if it's on sale.
2. **Target Website:** Visit Target.com and search for the product. Check the product page for any promotions, discounts, or sales.
3. **Weekly Ad:** Check Target's weekly ad (available online or in-store) to see if the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel is featured as a sale item.
4. **Cartwheel App:** If you have the Cartwheel app, check if there are any offers available for Neutrogena products or skincare items.
5. **In-Store Signs:** When you visit your local Target store, keep an eye out for in-store signs or displays promoting sales or discounts on the Neutrogena Hydro Boost Water Gel.

Some common sales and promotions you might find include:

* Buy One Get One Free (BOGO) or Buy One Get One 50% Off (BOGO50)
* 10% to 20% off on skincare items or Neutrogena products
* $5 off on purchases of $20 or more on skincare items

Keep in mind that sales and promotions can vary by location and are subject to change. If you don't see a sale, you can always ask a store employee if they have any upcoming promotions or discounts planned.

Good luck, and happy shopping!
